channel.title: axiom, politics on David Thuman
channel.description: Recent content in axiom, politics on David Thuman

item.title: Freedom
item.description: On the surface, freedom sounds like an amazing feature to have in your society. Why should I have people telling me how I can live my life? But even with that question, I can already see a flaw. Laws are clearly needed in a society, but they limit my freedom. So maybe freedom is not as strong as we first thought. The question for building any society to break down the needed and desired features.
